dialogue.htmlContent:
You soon find the door that you're looking for, marked with the words 'Inspector [brax.nameFull]'. Wondering what sort of person this '[brax.name]' might be, you reach up and knock on the door. Almost instantly, a low, gruff voice barks out in response, [brax.speech(Enter!)]

Pushing open the door, you step forwards into [brax.namePos] office. As you take a quick glance around, you notice that there are numerous posters of scantily-clad girls plastered all over the walls, which gives this room a rather unexpectedly-unprofessional feel to it. Apart from this oddity, the only other features of any interest are the normal collection of filing cabinets and bookshelves standing against the walls, a large mahogany desk on the other side of the room, and the imposing figure who's sitting behind it.

As the door starts to swing shut behind you, the person behind the desk, who you assume to be [brax.name], stands up. He's a greater wolf-morph, and is covered from head to toe in [brax.skinColour] fur. His face is formed into an anthropomorphic wolf-like muzzle, and his pair of eyes are a wild, vivid shade of [brax.eyeColour]. As would be expected, he's wearing an Enforcer's uniform, consisting of a blue shirt, black slacks, and a black tie. Behind him, hanging up on the wall, is his jacket, cap and dress belt.

Staring right at you, [brax.name] angrily slams his fist on the desk. You see his huge muscles bulge underneath his Enforcer's shirt as he growls at you, [brax.speech(I told that stupid slut to stop handing out passes! Who the hell are you?!)]

#IF(pc.getRace()==RACE_WOLF_MORPH && pc.isFeminine())

As he finishes barking out his question, you see his hungry eyes drop down to roam over your wolf-like body, and you wonder if he has a weakness for wolf-girls. Wanting to test your theory, you turn back to face the door, pushing it firmly shut while not-so-subtly sticking out your ass towards [brax.name]. Turning back to face him, your suspicions are proven to be correct as you see his eyes fogged over with lust...

#ENDIF

#IF(!pc.isQuestProgressGreaterThan(QUEST_LINE_MAIN, QUEST_MAIN_1_C_WOLFS_DEN))

As he sees that it's you who's entering his office once again, [brax.namePos] jaw drops and he exclaims, [brax.speech(What the hell are you doing back here?! Did that braindead bimbo give you another pass?!)]

As you enter his office, ready for another fight, [brax.name] stands up, and you see the familiar sight of arcane fire being summoned around his right hand, while with the other he grabs his pistol.

[brax.speech(I guess you've just got a craving for wolf dick!)] [brax.name] laughs, and you realise that if you lose again, you're going to be getting another taste of his cock...

#ELSE

The door to the office which used to be [brax.namePos] is securely shut and locked. There's really nothing more for you to do here except turn around and leave...

#ENDIF

You decide that it's probably for the best if you just tell the truth, [pc.speech(I'm here to find out what's happened to my friend, Arthur. His apartment was empty, and your name was on the arrest warrant stamped to his door.)]

As you mention Arthur's name, [brax.name] lets out a dismissive grunt, and as you finish speaking, he huffs, [brax.speech(As if I'd tell you that! You come barging into my office, then expect me to hand out classified information?! I think you need to be the first test subject for a special punishment I've recently thought of!)]

As [brax.name] finishes speaking, you see a burst of arcane fire suddenly materialise around his right hand, while with his other, he reaches down to grab the pistol at his waist. From the angry expression on his face, it's not too hard to figure out that he intends to fight you. This all seems incredibly unreasonable, and you think that he was just looking for any excuse to try this 'punishment' out on someone...

As you take a closer look at [brax.namePos] office, you notice that the scantily-clad models in every single poster are wolf-girls. Shifting your gaze to look past [brax.namePos] desk for a moment, your eyes are drawn to a glass display cabinet sitting just behind him, and you see that it's full of small, half-naked wolf-girl figurines. From your observations of [brax.namePos] office, it's safe to assume that he has a thing for females of the same race as him.

Deciding to take a bold course of action, you use your deduction as inspiration to make up a story right there on the spot, [pc.speech(Well, after I informed the cat-girl at the front desk that I'm the owner of the establishment 'The She-wolf's Den', she said that you'd probably want to talk to me in person.)]

Just as you're kicking yourself for thinking up such a ridiculous name, you notice [brax.namePos] snarl fading away, and you struggle to keep your composure as he impatiently blurts out, [brax.speech(Wait, what's all this about a she-wolf's den?)]

Almost feeling sorry for [brax.name], you decide to tell him that he's a gullible idiot, [pc.speech(I can't believe you actually fell for that! Do you really have the rank of Inspector? That's just sad...)]

As he hears that he's been fooled, [brax.namePos] wolf-like face turns up into a snarl, and he slams his fist on the desk, shouting, [brax.speech(I-I knew you were lying all along! I don't even like wolf-girls! You'd better tell me what the hell you're here for, right now!)]

Despite the farcical nature of [brax.namePos] stuttering denial of his all-too-apparent weakness, you quickly realise from the angry expression on his face that he means business, and explain, [pc.speech(Well, if you want the truth, I'm here to find out what you've done with my friend, Arthur. I found his apartment empty, and your name was on the arrest warrant stamped to his door.)]

[brax.NamePos] snarling face relaxes a little, turning into a mocking sneer as he replies, [brax.speech(As if I'd tell you that! You come barging into my office, try to make a fool of me, then expect me to hand out classified information?! I think you need to be the first test subject for a special punishment I've recently thought of!)]

As [brax.name] finishes speaking, you see a burst of arcane fire suddenly materialise around his right hand, while with his other, he reaches down to grab the pistol at his waist. From the angry, although somewhat flustered, expression on his face, it's not too hard to figure out that he intends to fight you. Resorting to violence like this seems more than a little unreasonable, and you think that he was just looking for any excuse to try this 'punishment' out on someone...

Wondering just how gullible [brax.name] really is, you continue bluffing, [pc.speech(I'm not surprised that you haven't heard about it; membership of my club is by recommendation only. I'm sure you understand, but I wouldn't want any old member of the public being allowed to enjoy the company of the most beautiful wolf-girls in all of Dominion.)]

You struggle not to laugh as you see [brax.namePos] eyes glazing over with lust. [brax.speech(The most beautiful wolf-girls? So... what do they do in your club?)]

[pc.speech(Absolutely anything that's asked of them,)] you reply, and as you see that [brax.name] is by now totally taken in by your ruse, you decide to move onto business, [pc.speech(You know, I'm sure I could rely on an Inspector like you to really appreciate the girls at my club, and I'd love to offer you a recommendation to join, but I have a slight problem that needs solving first...)]

[brax.speech(Anything!)] [brax.name] eagerly blurts out.

[pc.speech(Excellent!)] you reply, [pc.speech(You see, an acquaintance of mine, going by the name of Arthur, owes me a good deal of money. When I paid him a visit, however, I found his apartment empty, and your name was on an arrest warrant fixed to his door. Could you tell me what happened to him?)]

[brax.Name] fidgets uncomfortably as you reveal the reason for your visit. [brax.speech(Ah... Well, you see, he's kind of a special case... I really shouldn't divulge information relating to-)]

[pc.speech(That's a real shame. You know, many of our patrons like to take two or three girls at once...)]

[brax.speech(Damn it!)] [brax.name] exclaims, interrupting your sentence. Grabbing a piece of paper out from a pile of freshly-signed documents, he thrusts it into your hands and says, [brax.speech(Don't tell anyone I gave you this! Now, where's this establishment of yours?!)]

Wanting to trick him one last time, you give [brax.name] a series of instructions which will end up with him returning right back here at Enforcer HQ. Just as you thought, he's so completely blinded by his lust for wolf-girls that he doesn't realise you're sending him in a huge circuit of the city. As he leaps up and runs for the door, you wonder if you should tell him what a gullible idiot he is...

You barely have time to say goodbye to your gullible friend before he bounds out of the door, muttering about how he won't need 'that slut downstairs' any more.

You finally have a moment to read over the piece of paper [brax.name] gave to you, and as you do so, you can't help but let out an annoyed sigh. It looks like Arthur is going to be one difficult person to track down, as the paper says:

Dominion Enforcer Department
RECORD OF SLAVE TRANSFER

According to the laws of Dominion, the person of [arthur.fullName], having being found guilty of treason, has been enslaved. Following standard procedure, ownership has been transferred to a registered slave trader chosen by random lottery.

Officer in charge of transferring slave ownership: [brax.fullName]

Slave trader taking ownership: [scarlett.fullName]

Contact address: Scarlett's shop, Slaver Alley

After reading it over a second time, you realise that you're going to have to make your way to Slaver Alley and see if you can find some way to buy Arthur. Taking one last look around [brax.namePos] office, you notice that there's two neatly-folded Enforcer's uniforms lying on top of a cabinet. To punish [brax.name] a little more for falling for such an obvious trick, you could take a spare uniform and add it to your inventory.

Almost feeling sorry for [brax.name], you decide to tell him that he's a gullible idiot, [pc.speech(Do you really believe that there's a place called 'The She-wolf's Den'? You do realise that I made all that up, right? I mean, no one can be that much of a gullible idiot!)]

With his hand on the door-handle, [brax.name] stops, and with an unsure stammer, turns back to you, [brax.speech(W-What do you mean? I-I knew you were lying all along! I don't even like wolf-girls!)]

You can't help but laugh at [brax.namePos] stuttering denial of his all-too-apparent weakness, #IF(pc.getRace()==RACE_WOLF_MORPH && pc.isFeminine()) [pc.speech(Oh, please! I see the way you keep glancing at my body! You couldn't make it any more obvious if you painted a big sign on your head reading '[brax.name] is a bitch for wolf-girls'!)] #ELSE [pc.speech(Oh, please! You couldn't make it any more obvious if you painted a big sign on your head reading '[brax.name] is a bitch for wolf-girls'!)] #ENDIF

[brax.namePos] face turns back up into the same snarl that you saw when you first entered his office. [brax.speech(S-Shut up! You want to see how much I like wolf-girls?! Fine! I think you need to be the first test subject for a special punishment I've recently thought of!)]

As [brax.name] finishes speaking, you see a burst of arcane fire suddenly materialise around his right hand, while with his other, he reaches down to grab the pistol at his waist. From the angry, although somewhat flustered, expression on his face, it's not too hard to figure out that he intends to fight you. Resorting to violence like this seems more than a little unreasonable, and you think that he was just looking for any excuse to try this 'punishment' out on someone...

Realising that you can use your body to get what you want, you slowly walk over to [brax.namePos] desk, suggestively swaying your [pc.hipSize] hips with each step. Just as you'd hoped, [brax.name] can't take his eyes off of you, and he slowly sits back down, his thoughts lost in a pink haze of arousal as he watches your provocative movements.

[pc.speech(You know, it's not often that I get to meet such handsome wolf-boys...)] you sigh, leaning forwards over [brax.namePos] desk as you bat your eyelids at him.

Despite it being completely obvious what you're trying to do, [brax.namePos] weakness for wolf-girls has left him completely unable to act in a rational manner. As he hears you calling him handsome, a stupid grin crosses his face, and you smile back as you realise that he's now totally under your spell.

[pc.speech(You know, [brax.name],)] you tease, reaching forwards to playfully straighten his tie, [pc.speech(I was hoping you could help me. My friend, Arthur, seems to have been arrested, and it was your name on the arrest warrant. Could you tell me what happened to him? Pretty please?)]

In a hypnotised trance, [brax.name] leans down and produces a piece of paper, before pushing it into your hands. [brax.speech(Just for you, but don't tell anyone I gave you this!)]

Looking down, you read over the piece of paper [brax.name] gave to you, and as you do so, you can't help but let out an annoyed sigh. It looks like Arthur is going to be one difficult person to track down, as the paper says:

Dominion Enforcer Department
RECORD OF SLAVE TRANSFER

According to the laws of Dominion, the person of [arthur.fullName], having being found guilty of treason, has been enslaved. Following standard procedure, ownership has been transferred to a registered slave trader chosen by random lottery.

Officer in charge of transferring slave ownership: [brax.fullName]

Slave trader taking ownership: [scarlett.fullName]

Contact address: Scarlett's shop, Slaver Alley

After a moment of frantically forcing his tongue down your throat, he releases you, and you step back, panting for breath. [brax.name] is the first to make the next move, and he suddenly pulls his head back to break off the kiss before leaning down to growl into your ear, [brax.speech(Good bitch, now get down on all fours and present yourself!)]

[pc.speech(Oh, would you look at the time! I really need to be going now,)] you exclaim, disentangling yourself from [brax.namePos] clutches. [pc.speech(I'll come back later, and we can have some fun then, ok?)]

Letting out a disappointed grunt, [brax.name] reluctantly steps back, seemingly placated for now by your promise of a future rendezvous. Narrowing his eyes, he growls, [brax.speech(You'd better be back soon!)]

Making more vague promises, you step back out into the corridor, breathing a sigh of relief as you pull the door firmly shut behind you. Turning to leave by the same route as which you arrived, you quickly set off towards the exit.

As you pass an empty office, you look in and notice that there are two neatly-folded Enforcer's uniforms lying on top of a cabinet. Deciding that you need a little compensation after being forcefully kissed by [brax.name], you take one of the spare uniforms and add it to your inventory on your way out.

Brax takes one last half-hearted swing at you, which you easily sidestep. Stumbling past you, he ends up collapsing against his desk, completely and utterly defeated.

Walking over to his submissive form, you can't help but smirk as you hear him surrender, [brax.speech(P-Please... No more...)]

Grinning down at the broken wolf-boy, you demand to know what's happened to Arthur. Turning to one side, Brax pulls a piece of the paper out from a pile of freshly-signed documents and hands it over to you. Reading over it, you can't help but let out an annoyed sigh. It looks like Arthur is going to be one difficult person to track down, as the paper says:

Dominion Enforcer Department
RECORD OF SLAVE TRANSFER

According to the laws of Dominion, the person of [arthur.fullName], having being found guilty of treason, has been enslaved. Following standard procedure, ownership has been transferred to a registered slave trader chosen by random lottery.

Officer in charge of transferring slave ownership: [brax.fullName]

Slave trader taking ownership: [scarlett.fullName]

Contact address: Scarlett's shop, Slaver Alley

A little groan brings your attention back to Brax, and as you look down at him, you see a lustful glimmer in his eyes. Surprisingly, it doesn't seem as though anyone outside the office has heard your fight, and you wonder if you should take advantage of this wolf-boy's weakened state...
